metadata.title: CVE-2023-43375 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Hoteldruid v3.0.5 was discovered to contain multiple SQL injectionvulnerabilities at /hoteldruid/clienti.php via the annonascita,annoscaddoc, giornonascita, giornoscaddoc, lingua_cli, mesenascita, andmesescaddoc parameters.

criterions.comment: hoteldruid package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
